metadata.title: CVE-2020-29660 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A locking inconsistency issue was discovered in the tty subsystem of theLinux kernel through 5.9.13. drivers/tty/tty_io.c anddrivers/tty/tty_jobctrl.c may allow a read-after-free attack againstTIOCGSID, aka CID-c8bcd9c5be24.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29660` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-188-generic - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-lowlatency - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-3.13.0-188-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-188-generic - 3.13.0-188.239
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-188-lowlatency - 3.13.0-188.239
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-203-generic - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-lowlatency - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-203-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-203-generic - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-203-lowlatency - 4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1086-aws - 4.4.0-1086.90
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1108-azure - 4.15.0-1108.120~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-188.239').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-203.235~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1086.90').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1108.120~14.04.1').
